divs: Sighting DetailsI'm so sorry to take up your report form like this, but I didn't find any other way to contact your director, Mr. Sam Maranto. While I am a UFO enthusiast, who would be interested in joining my home state (Ill) MUFON organization, I was curious as to whether Mr. Maranto is related to a Sam Maranto I knew years ago who sold cars for Oldsmobile? Please write back and let me know as soon as you can. Thanks!
